website_summaries.verdict: For basic automation, these Bluetooth bulbs will do the trick, but if you want your lights to work as part of a larger connected home setup, look elsewhere.
pros: HomeBrite's scheduling controls are about as comprehensive as you'll find with Bluetooth LEDs, but the app is still intuitive and straight-forward to use
You'll also find a greater variety of bulb shapes than you will with competing smart bulb lines, including bulbs for chandeliers, recessed lights, and outdoor fixtures
cons: The bulbs don't offer much of anything by way of third-party compatibility, which means that you can't sync them up with motion detectors, smart hubs, or voice control platforms
The app is also a bit sluggish at times

customer_reviews.title: Nice concept. Sad to report to doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: The product holds great promise as its concept is exciting. But the schedules simply don't work. They will remain set for a few days - on at dark and off at dawn - but will unexpectedly cease to work at all. I then reset the schedules, and again they work for only a few days. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Just a disaster in terms of functionality. The bluetooth/app connectivity is a nightmare, especially when trying to use the schedule/timer functions. Lights never come on when they're supposed to, and often times will just turn on at random times. Most times, some will turn off at the designated timer time, but at least 1 light will stay lit without interruption. They simply just don't function as they are designed to. Save yourself the money, and just buy regular LED bulbs. Until they improve the functionality, these are just absurdly priced, occasionally functional light bulbs. Definitely not worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Rydeen

customer_reviews.title: Avoid!
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. I installed 3 of them in my living room and was pleased at first, then after a few days realized how flaky and unreliable they are. They lose sync with the app, where the app thinks they're on but they're off, and vice versa. They 'forget' their state when you set a dimness level, turn the switch off then turn the switch on again. They also turn on by themselves at random times even though I have no schedule set in the app. This means I have to turn the lamps off at the mains when I go out, defeating the whole purpose. (The firmware is up to date, by the way.) Total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Wrighton

customer_reviews.title: THESE DON'T WORK. DON'T BUY.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with app. Purchase 30 of these and did not work. I looked online AFTER the purchase to find LOT OF NEGATIVE REVIEWS about the app working and to call customer service. AFTER 20 MINUTES on hold with support they informed me that they will replacement because they are aware of the problem. It's been over 3 months. Have not got any replacements yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very good choice for an energy efficient flood lamp!
customer_reviews.text: These are the brightest energy efficient flood lights I’ve found after trying some earlier models. The other reviews had me hesitant to try these but when the price dropped I took a chance and am glad I did. The Bluetooth connectivity works great with the manufacturer app though I’m unsure it will work with Apple HomeKit.
customer_reviews.author: Goodneighbor

customer_reviews.title: The app is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these which seemed to work fine. So I bought two more and when I tried to add them to the other 2 on the app everything just failed. Now the app doesn’t work at all for ANY of the bulbs. I’ve tried resetting the app, deleting and reinstalling it, removing and reinstalling the bulbs, everything I can think of and no luck. So I’ve concluded that the app is garbage and moving on to something better. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bass

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money...
customer_reviews.text: Believe the 41% 1-star reviews...this bulb doesn't work on a schedule...even a simple one. Downloaded latest app, updated bulb firmware and uploaded the on/off schedule (multiple times over several months). Bulb is unable to follow a simple same everyday on/off schedule. Don't waste your money. Bulb had continuous power and was not turned off. Have tried to contact Feit for technical support and/or refund without success. My experience dealing with this company is that Feit is very disorganized...and it shows in the poor quality engineering of their products.
customer_reviews.author: pete

customer_reviews.title: SKEPTICAL BUT SO FAR SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: had to replace an identical bulb purchased only two years ago. brains in the original bulb went Tango Uniform for an unknown reason. there had been no major lightning storms or power surges for at least six months. the other original bulb still functions properly, why the first one crapped out is a mystery. The one purchased works fine, tied in with the app just fine. So only time will tell. Functionally, the bulb emits a fair amount of light and illuminates nicely. Installation & set up are fairly easy and straightforward
customer_reviews.author: JW DICKINSON

customer_reviews.title: poorly documented
customer_reviews.text: This is poorly documented the product hardware and software is really good I started writing a missing manual but amazon wont link to it, so you have to google it and find my page. I talked with tech support and from what I learned started a web page on this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Mister E2

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: Not sure who they paid to get any 5 star reviews because this product is trash. Maybe theybought reviews to cover the real ones I am very computer savvy being 30 years in I.T. I programmed this bulb for specific times, but it continues to have its own schedule. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Setting permanent recurring timer schedules/scenes works great.
customer_reviews.text: HomeBrite connectivity is very fidgety - very often requires a lot of patience. Would not rely on its connectivity for quick on/off circumstances (we use it to time/dim/remote off the lights in baby/toddler rooms - don't expect to rapidly command the bulbs at a moments notice to accommodate sudden sleep/nap windows). Setting permanent recurring timer schedules/scenes works great.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does't work like you think it would....
customer_reviews.text: What a pain in the a## this thing is. It took many bulb resets and app reloads just to get the scheduling of the bulb to work properly. Most of the time the app won't find the bulb and I'm just sitting 10 feet away. If it does find it, it usually has taken a couple of minutes to find it. I want to be able to turn the light on or off conveniently...this definitely doesn't do it. It's no better than just having a regular bulb on a mechanical timer.
customer_reviews.author: bug54

customer_reviews.title: Reinstall the app every time you want to turn it on or off.
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult setup, had to do it multiple times, to set a basic schedule, which is the only way it's usable, as the app crashes Everytime when I try to access it a day later, and I have to completely uninstall and reinstall the app to control it. If I could give less than a star I would. This can't be used as anything more than a standard bulb. Worked fine on a schedule for about a week (after tons of frustration with setup) before it forgot how to tell time and started coming on during the morning/day instead of 5-11pm.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin C.

customer_reviews.title: Whatever technology they use to communicate with bulb is terrible. It worked ok for one bulb
customer_reviews.text: Whatever technology they use to communicate with bulb is terrible. It worked ok for one bulb. Then I bought 5 more and it was a nightmare. Used for over a year and bulbs wouldn’t turn on/off when scheduled and couldn’t communicate. Used as directed and called customer service a number of times to troubleshoot. Resetting bulbs is tedious (have to manually turn bulb on/off for a number of second a number of times). It was over a year of frustration before I paid a little extra for Philips Hue. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Black

customer_reviews.title: These lights do not work as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a while, but took far too long to get it set up. Managed to program on / off times and preset dimming. Tried to switch them on one night and could not connect. BUT the previous program continued to work until we had power glitch. Now they are on until I get the ladder in so that I can switch them off. And yes I have the 4.4.4 android error now that my phone has upgraded to 9.0. so a lot of money for ordinary LED bulbs that cant be dimmed normally. I think I will just have to extend my X 10 system
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Smith

customer_reviews.title: dont buy
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for a few months now. Every week or so it would forget the timer schedule and I would have to reconnect the phone to the lights and this normally would take at least 10 to 15 tries over a couple of days to work properly.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Used to be good
customer_reviews.text: When this came out it work well. But now they must have fired the guy who writes their code because it sucks..... Try a newer product... Just an expensive light build now because Amazon won't take it back...
customer_reviews.author: Byrdnest

customer_reviews.title: Great lights! Be sure to put on a non-dimmer ...
customer_reviews.text: Great lights! Be sure to put on a non-dimmer Switch for full use of the app. Love these Bulbs! After setting up groups in the app, I can dim or turn off one or two or all, depending on the situation. Great Bulbs and app combo.

customer_reviews.title: Great led flood with app
customer_reviews.text: Great bulb. Have been running 2 on the driveway 10 hours per day for the last 2 years without issue. The HomeBrite app is pretty nice as well...allows you to set a personalized schedule on the bulbs as well as create custom groups.
customer_reviews.author: Sttomper

customer_reviews.title: Great Bulb, Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This light works great with the App. It seamlessly turns on at the desired time I have set and turns off at its specified time with no trouble. It works great as a flood light over the garage. Any issues with connectivity with the App seem to have been fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: This product works as advertised, Ideal for Outdoor lighting control
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these lights for Sunroom and Outdoor patio for additional lighting control. The product works as advertised and had no issues with bluetooth controls.
customer_reviews.author: quasar

customer_reviews.title: We've tried and tried to program these lights but they ...
customer_reviews.text: We've tried and tried to program these lights but they never follow the schedule. They come on and off when they aren't supposed to. We've tried all of the suggested troubleshooting ideas but without success. Save your money and avoid these light bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Avechuco

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: These works ok. If the electricity goes out, as it seems to do often in our area, they have to be reset from the phone app., and you have to stay next to the bulb to reset.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Bad bulb
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 bulbs, one worked fine however the other would not connect to Bluetooth. When I looked at the box it appears to have be returned merchandise. Needless to say I’m not going to buy bulbs like this from Amazon again. Buy them locally so if there is a problem you don’t have to deal with Amazons return hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, does not work right
customer_reviews.text: I really was hoping this would work properly, but it did not. Set up was a piece of cake, turning the bulb on and off through the app and even dimming it worked great. However, I tried setting a schedule three times and it only worked one of the three times. Unacceptable. Sending it back. Great concept, but unfortunately does not work.

customer_reviews.title: Boo. Hiss.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have read the user reviews first. Had to buy new globes for my ceiling fans bc of the size of these things-then realized they are NOT compatible with Alexa even tho I specifically searched for Alexa compatible bulbs, I should have read the fine print before ordering. 🤬 overall: this whole experience was a bucket of suck (and yes-it’s my fault. )

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: These things are ajoke i spent like 54 dollars for four the will not pair with the application at all i have tried everything. Just rediculous dont buy. I spent 3 hours trying to pair to blue tooth

customer_reviews.title: Bulb is fine but app is junk
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this bulb. The bulb itself is fine but the application to use it is junk. 1) app is slow to load and connect 2) this assumes the app loads. After the first day of installation app fails to open on Android phones. 3) interface is difficult and non-intuitive

customer_reviews.title: Worked and then didn't work
customer_reviews.text: They worked for a little while. Seems like it is more an issue with the app, but they never keep the settings that you set. I tried to have them be at a 10% power, but are always on 100% even though the app says 10. They need resetting often, and if you're not standing next to it won't sync. I would think there are better options out there. I have 3 bulbs and they all do different things.

customer_reviews.title: Worthless. Scheduling does not work

I left town for a couple of weeks when I first installed, and could not access remotely. Neighbors informed me the lights never turned off. Waste of money. Will replace with something else.

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth is more secure then wireless devices like lights and thermostats
customer_reviews.text: Worked out really well. Used it in a hard to reach swag lamp. Put the bulb in, d/l'd the app to my iPhone and connected. Setup was as simple as that. Bluetooth is more secure then wireless devices like lights and thermostats, which is why I chose a bluetooth device Update: The bulb is fine but the software is totally unreliable after the first setup and frequently, almost every time, the only solution is to delete the software and re-install it, but that doesn't always work and you have to keep playing to get it to work

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchases on Amazon ever

customer_reviews.title: If you want remote control control via Bluetooth to your lights this is great. I have all the lights in my great ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't understand the reviews. This is simple. If you want remote control control via Bluetooth to your lights this is great. I have all the lights in my great room on this. One button in the app controls all the light. I can turn them on and off and dim all. Only complaint is can't connect easily to multiple IOs devices. It does work great with my iPhone. Only concern today is that the app is missing from the App Store

customer_reviews.title: Have to reconnect to it every time you leave you're house takes about 10 seconds to reconnect .

customer_reviews.text: Sorry Feit, but these are awful. I give 1 star, and not zero, because the light bulbs do illuminate. The issue, for me, is the "smart" part of the build has a mind of its own. I've set-up multiple schedules to no avail... These bulbs turn on and off whenever they want. It's terrible. I've been out of town and my poor family has been in the dark on the front porch because the lights won't turn on and I have the controls (app) installed on my phone. I was really hopeful these would be awesome, but they are awful.

customer_reviews.title: Good.

Have uninstalled and reinstalled the app numerous times with no luck at all. Until they can fix these issues I wouldn't recommend to anyone. Original review: I love this product. Works as advertised but can't give it 5 stars because it won't let me connect a second phone to them so only on my phone which means my husband has no control over the lights. Thankfully for the laundry room he is able to just turn the switch off and then back on and the light will turn on.

customer_reviews.title: These are great bulbs, good price for what you're getting and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great bulbs, good price for what you're getting and the app is super easy to use. If anyone else is looking for adjustable color though don't make my mistake, I'd been looking at a load of bluetooth enabled bulbs and had planned to buy a pair with adjustable color (not wanting any blue light in our bedroom at night) and accidentally ordered these. They were awesome though, just not what I'd meant to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie S.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: My bulbs work but have stopped paring to my phone!

customer_reviews.title: Incompatible with smartthings
customer_reviews.text: As far as I can tell, it isn't compatible with anything and you have to use the app to control it. Works fine if that is all you use, but as part of a larger home automation system it is a complete waste. I highly recommend Cree bulbs over this.
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Great smartbulb
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these smart bulbs as the big name brand ones are extremely expensive in Canada. These Feit ones are great. They screw in just like regular bulbs but can be controlled through their app. I can set time, turn on and off and control both or just one. It does not need a hub ot anything other than a smartphone and the bulb itself. You do need wifi.
customer_reviews.author: vcrjoe

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: this unit gives light that has a nice warm glow. i believe "soft white" to be an accurate descriptor. the build quality is solid. the app is fine--easy to use. the schedule section has a nice graphic showing on and off times similar to the dial on a mechanical light timer. i do wish either that the app knew when sunset was by latitude and longitude coordinates, or that units of this type had a light sensor built in.
customer_reviews.author: pops

customer_reviews.title: these have worked great. We had an old chandelier that had a ...
customer_reviews.text: For us, these have worked great. We had an old chandelier that had a short in it when we used regular bulbs and we wired it to a weird spot in our house that has no switch (?!) so we needed a solution where we could turn the lights on/off without a switch. We haven't had any issues with the bulbs un-grouping themselves and we love that we can dim these bulbs as well. Great ambiance and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Ali / Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Never did get it to work.
customer_reviews.text: I should have sent it back but to lazy to. Never did get it to work and I asked for help from a person that knows this stuff.

customer_reviews.title: Smart? No, dumb!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bulb to serve only one purpose: turn on and off by schedule. And it completely ignores it! Doesn't turn on when needed and doesn't turn off when needed. And now Android app crashes when I try to edit schedules.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: The innovation is unique and enjoyable. Putting a dimmer in a location where it would take a little know how with electrical wiring to do it from a regular switch and remotely. I plan on buying a few more for other rooms.

customer_reviews.text: I love this bulb !! Simple install, works every time. It is a little slow making contact but that is because I turn off my bluetooth each time. If I used a tablet that was left at home and on all the time, I am certain the connection issue would not be there. I am eager to get more bulbs and set up some groups and timers.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, it will not work.
customer_reviews.text: I am an electrical engineer. The design of this item is flawed. It does not function as advertised. It retains residual memory that messes up the schedule. I tried to link 30 of those, bit FAIL. Don't buy, it will not work. Safe your time and money.

customer_reviews.text: So far the bulbs haven't been very good. I've programmed them and I haven't been able to turn them down with my phone yet. I'll keep trying but at this time I wouldn't recommend them.

customer_reviews.title: Da bulbz
customer_reviews.text: I was worried at first because I never spent that much on a light bulb(s) but im satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money
customer_reviews.text: Software crashed or locked up erratically making remote operation annoyingly unreliable. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The software is a little flaky but the product has real promise.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good light
customer_reviews.text: Helpful to schedule on and off for a light only on a switch. Easy to set up and easy interface
customer_reviews.author: Stephen E Rauch

customer_reviews.title: FRUSTRAITING APP
customer_reviews.text: Looses connection A LOT. Great when it does work! 11 more words required, 11 more words required, blah blah blah
customer_reviews.author: L. Rowan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, saves me the hassle of remembering to turn off the porch light in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Flaky Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: The bulb turns on randomly. I have reset the bulb and refreshes other settings in the app without sucess. Also, you need to be witthin 50 to 100 feet to control the bulb.
customer_reviews.author: KN

customer_reviews.title: HUGE disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. Very disappointing. 5 months of re-programming this thing every 2 weeks before it gave up completely and wouldn't connect to Bluetooth. Into the trash you go. Switched back to a manual timer and a $3 LED.
customer_reviews.author: DeeVeen

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Installed, set up and scheduled in just a few minutes. Works great. Just wish it could be turned off or on away from home.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: works well but watch for size
customer_reviews.text: It's very bright and dims well. The ap is nice and simple to use. I'm giving these to my dad for Christmas and it will be easy for him to use. My only complaint is that as a chandelier bulb it is very large, and sticks far out the top of our fixture and is almost too wide. It does still work though, and I probably could've avoided issues by taking measurements from the description. As the only chandelier smart light bulb I could find it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I put the bulb in, turned on the wall switch and it came on. I sat under the bulb with my phone in my hand and my Echo on the headboard but neither would recognize the bulb. I turned the wall switch off for a few seconds then back on but still nothing. Unscrewed the bulb and put it back in and, yep, still nothing. Sorry to waste our time and money for shipping, Amazon, but I'm not keeping a useless $10 light bulb!
customer_reviews.author: Scaren

customer_reviews.title: Needs way more R&D great concept
customer_reviews.text: Product doesn't work consistently. Pair works 1 out of 20. Needs way more R&D great concept tho
customer_reviews.author: AZITSource

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my needs. Only issue is that ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my needs. Only issue is that it can take longer for the app to connect that I would desire.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Brubaker

customer_reviews.title: The app is great and easy to use and understand
customer_reviews.text: These work very well. The app is great and easy to use and understand. Recommend highly
customer_reviews.author: jsvjr

customer_reviews.title: Can't figure out how to use with Alexa, although was told yes they will.
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to figure out how to get these to work with Alexa. I had asked before I purchased and the answer was yes they work with Alexa, I have yet to figure out how using all the online resources I can find. If anyone can help that would be great. They do work with the Feit app but I bought them specifically to use with Alexa which is why I sent the question first.
customer_reviews.author: K. W.

product_meta.title: FEIT ELECTRIC BR30/650/LED/HBR 9W BR30 Smart LED Bulb
product_meta.description: Style:BR30HomeBrite by Feit Electric offers an easy, convenient, and cost-effective way to introduce smart lighting into any home or business. Simply install the HomeBrite LED bulb, download the free HomeBrite app to your phone or tablet, and begin controlling and customizing your lights! The HomeBrite App serves as a virtual mobile light switch, which allows you to dim and power lights on and off, set schedules and timers, create scenes, and manage groups. HomeBrite’s Bluetooth Smart Mesh technology allows the LED bulbs to seamlessly and securely communicate with one another, expanding the range for whole-house control. The 65-watt replacement BR30 HomeBrite LED bulb lasts more than 20 times longer than your standard incandescent, lasting up to 22.8 years. This BR30 Smart LED bulb is soft white and dimmable via the HomeBrite app. The indoor LED reflector is great for track or recessed lighting fixtures, down lights or spotlights.
feature_bullets: Easy setup - simply pair bulbs with your Bluetooth smart device then start controlling and customizing your homebrite system. No hub, remote, gateway, Wi-Fi, or cellular signal is needed
On/off/dim - turn your bulbs on and off, or dim them from anywhere in your house from one or more Bluetooth smart device
Schedules - set schedules to turn individual bulbs or Groups on or off at a set date and time. Set a recurring schedule to repeat daily

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.7 out of 5 stars241 ratings2.7 out of 5 stars
